quotes.text: Strength doesn't come from what you can do; it comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your body can stand almost anything; it's your mind you have to convince.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Don't count the days; make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Sweat is just fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not about having time; it's about making time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Believe in yourself, and you will be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but keep going anyway.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Excuses don't burn calories.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else; it's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The difference between a goal and a dream is a deadline.
quotes.author: Steve Smith

quotes.text: Make your vision so clear that your fears become irrelevant.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Every workout is a step closer to your goals.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are only limited by your imagination
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Champions aren't built on the days they feel motivated but the days they feel like quitting
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No carelessness in my action, No confusion in my words, No imprecision in my thoughts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: I would rather live a short life of glory than a long one of obscurity.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: We all love ourselves more than other people, but care more about thier opinion than our own.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you but how you react to it that matters
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Have patience, all things are difficult before they become easy
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.text: Do not expect life to be fair
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It is a shame for a man to grow old without seeing the beauty and strength which his body is capable
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: We live in the present, We dream of the future, And we learn eternal truths from the past.
quotes.author: Madame Chiang Kai-Shek

quotes.text: Wolves do not lose sleep over the opinions of sheep
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Once you see results, it becomes an addiction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The moment of pain is worth a lifetime of glory
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies, for the hardest victory is over self
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Isn't it time to embrace change and become the person you've always wanted to be?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: Your body is a reflection of your lifestyle.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You are stronger than you think.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be the energy you want to attract.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are what you repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle
